name: Colorfull (Team Pfusch, Fox_score)
description:
This game was made in 3 Weeks as a school project, by 5 artists, and 2 programmers who've never before touched the Unreal Engine in their entire life.

We've originally created this game as a school project, but may continue working on it if we have enough time.

May luck be on your side, and have fun :)

Special Credits

  • Sulayman Drammeh (Badibourecords) - Audio
